SARDataComponentParams.title2:
Mining Module (Active):
Fires a pulse down the length of the beam at the Deposit that detonates, increasing the Total Charge Level of the Deposit by 40%, but also increases the Shatter Damage of the Deposit by 200% and the Overcharge Rate of the Deposit by 100% for 30 seconds.
Duration: Instant (with 30s debuff)
Uses: 5

Localization.Name: Surge Module
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Mining Laser Power: 150%
Resistance: -15%

Laser Instability: +10%

Duration: 15 seconds
Uses: 7

Instantly inject energy into a deposit with the Surge. It uses a special configuration of lenses to increase mining laser power and bypass a deposit's resistance. It does require careful management as the module also increases laser instability.
